meanings.definition: Sharpies: a brand of permanent markers
meanings.sent1: I used sharpies to color my drawing.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out sharpies for us to use on the project.
meanings.sent3: The sharpies were so colorful, they made the white paper look like a rainbow!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed through the sharpies onto the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The smell of sharpies always reminds me of art class.

meanings.definition: Sharpies: individuals who are clever or quick-witted
meanings.sent1: The sharpies in the group always came up with the best ideas.
meanings.sent2: She was known as one of the sharpies in the office for her problem-solving skills.
meanings.sent3: The sharpies at the party had everyone laughing with their witty jokes.
meanings.sent4: His sharpies cut through the confusion and found the solution in no time.
meanings.sent5: The sharpies in the debate club never failed to impress with their arguments.
